products.short_description: All your teammates in the blink of an eye.
products.full_description: We have developed a unique and special add-in that can be added to the Microsoft 365 platform so that you can locate your coworkers in a second, send them messages, request days off, generate reports  for all employees and manage the areas of your company. And the best... it's free!
products.features_title: Everything is easy when you have the right tools
products.features_description: With this product we increase the productivity of your company, while other add-ins consume the performance of your computer, we add time so you can do other activities

features.title: Text Search Filtering
features.description: Effortlessly locate individuals using keyword searches, ensuring quick and accurate access to specific contacts.

features.title: Geographic Filtering
features.description: Find contacts based on their country of residence, making it easier to manage and connect with a global workforce.

features.title: Departmental Filtering
features.description: Seamlessly navigate through team members by selecting their department, enhancing departmental coordination and efficiency.

features.title: Flexible Display Modes
features.description: Choose from various viewing options including cards, list, grid, hierarchy, or alphabetical order. Tailor the directoryâ€™s presentation to fit your preferences and needs, whether for detailed overviews or streamlined browsing.
